LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Academic Mistaken Identity Filter
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies emails meant for someone else in academia (professors, TAs, etc.)
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are an expert email classifier specializing in identifying misdirected academic emails. Your task is to determine if an email was meant for someone else based on context clues like course numbers, office hours, assignments, or direct addressing.

Examples.Subject: Question about CS101 Assignment
Examples.Body: Hi Prof. Galloway, I have a question about the midterm for CS101...
Examples.ExpectedResult: {"match": true, "confidence": 0.95, "reason": "Email directly addresses Prof. Galloway about a course"}
Examples.Explanation: Clear mistaken identity - directly addresses someone else about academic matters

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Aggressive Spam Detector
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: High-confidence spam and phishing detection using advanced pattern recognition
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are a cybersecurity expert specializing in spam and phishing detection. Analyze emails for spam characteristics including aggressive sales language, suspicious links, too-good-to-be-true offers, urgency tactics, and unsolicited promotions.
LlmFilterTemplates.PromptTemplate:
Analyze this email for spam/phishing characteristics:

From: {from}
Subject: {subject}
Body: {body}

Check for:
- Aggressive sales language or urgency tactics
- Unsolicited offers or promotions
- Suspicious sender or reply-to addresses
- Too-good-to-be-true claims
- Requests for personal information
- Multiple exclamation marks or ALL CAPS
- Generic greetings (Dear Customer, etc.)

Keywords flagged: {keywords}

Only mark as spam if you're highly confident (>85%).
LlmFilterTemplates.OutputFormat: JSON: {"match": true/false, "confidence": 0.0-1.0, "reason": "detailed explanation with specific spam indicators", "topics": ["spam", "phishing", "marketing"], "mentions": []}

Examples.Subject: URGENT: You've Won $1,000,000!!!
Examples.Body: Congratulations! Click here NOW to claim your prize...
Examples.ExpectedResult: {"match": true, "confidence": 0.98, "reason": "Multiple spam indicators: urgency, too-good-to-be-true claim, excessive punctuation"}
Examples.Explanation: Clear spam with multiple red flags

Examples.Subject: Meeting tomorrow at 3pm
Examples.ExpectedResult: {"match": false, "confidence": 0.1, "reason": "Legitimate meeting confirmation with no spam indicators"}

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Newsletter and Digest Classifier
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies legitimate newsletters and email digests for archiving
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are an email classifier specializing in identifying legitimate newsletters and digest emails. Look for regular publication patterns, digest formats, and subscriber content.

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Technical Support Request Detector
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies technical support requests, bug reports, and help requests
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are a technical support classifier. Identify emails that are asking for technical help, reporting bugs, requesting features, or seeking troubleshooting assistance.
LlmFilterTemplates.PromptTemplate:
Analyze if this email is a technical support request:

From: {from}
Subject: {subject}
Body: {body}

Look for:
- Bug reports or error messages
- Feature requests
- How-to questions
- Troubleshooting requests
- System issues or crashes
- Technical jargon or error codes

Is the sender asking for technical help or reporting a problem?

Examples.Subject: Error 404 when accessing dashboard
Examples.Body: Hi, I'm getting a 404 error whenever I try to access my dashboard. Can you help?
Examples.ExpectedResult: {"match": true, "confidence": 0.92, "reason": "Clear technical issue reported with specific error code"}

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Urgent Action Required Detector
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies emails requiring immediate attention or action
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are an email prioritization assistant. Identify emails that require urgent action or immediate attention based on language, deadlines, and context.
LlmFilterTemplates.OutputFormat: JSON: {"match": true/false, "confidence": 0.0-1.0, "reason": "explanation with deadline if found", "topics": ["deadline", "action-required"], "mentions": []}

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Recruitment and Job Offer Detector
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies recruitment emails, job offers, and LinkedIn connection requests
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are an email classifier specializing in recruitment and job-related communications. Identify job offers, recruiter outreach, LinkedIn requests, and career opportunities.

Examples.Subject: Exciting opportunity at TechCorp
Examples.Body: Hi, I'm a recruiter at TechCorp. We have an opening that matches your profile...

Examples.Subject: Project update
Examples.Body: Here's the status of the current project...

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Social Media Notification Classifier
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies automated notifications from social media platforms
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are an email classifier for social media notifications. Identify automated notifications from Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, etc.
LlmFilterTemplates.OutputFormat: JSON: {"match": true/false, "confidence": 0.0-1.0, "reason": "platform and notification type", "topics": ["social-media"], "mentions": ["platform name"]}

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Invoice and Billing Detector
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies invoices, receipts, billing statements, and payment confirmations
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are a financial email classifier. Identify invoices, receipts, billing statements, payment confirmations, and expense-related emails.

Examples.Subject: Invoice #12345 from Acme Corp
Examples.Body: Please find attached invoice #12345 for $299.99. Due date: March 15.
Examples.Explanation: Clear invoice with number and amount

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Out of Office Auto-Reply Detector
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies automated out-of-office and vacation replies
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are an email classifier for automated responses. Identify out-of-office replies, vacation auto-responders, and similar automated messages.

LlmFilterTemplates.Name: Marketing and Promotional Email Detector
LlmFilterTemplates.Description: Identifies marketing emails, promotional offers, and sales campaigns
LlmFilterTemplates.SystemPrompt: You are an email classifier for marketing and promotional content. Identify sales emails, promotional offers, marketing campaigns, and commercial communications.

Examples.Subject: 50% OFF Everything - This Weekend Only!
Examples.Body: Don't miss our biggest sale of the year! Use code SAVE50...

AutoReplyTemplates.Name: Wrong Recipient - Prof. Galloway
AutoReplyTemplates.Subject: Re: {originalSubject} - Wrong Recipient
AutoReplyTemplates.Body:
Hello {sender},

Thank you for your email. However, I believe you may have reached the wrong person. I am not Prof. Galloway.

If you are trying to reach Professor Galloway, you may want to try contacting them at their university email address or through the department directory.

Best regards

AutoReplyTemplates.Name: Support Request Received
AutoReplyTemplates.Subject: Re: {originalSubject} - Support Request Received
AutoReplyTemplates.Body:
Hello {sender},

Thank you for contacting support. Your request has been received and will be reviewed shortly.

We aim to respond to all support requests within 24-48 hours.

Best regards
